TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuditLogLocation extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定寫入安全性相關事件記錄的位置。

span.span: Specifies the location where security-related event logs are written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在建立時需要驗證和/或授權的呼叫端的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 應用程式，您可以指定與安全性相關的事件會記錄成功、 失敗或兩者。When creating a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) application that requires authentication and/or authorization of callers, you can specify that events related to security be recorded for either success, failure, or both. 記錄的位置是由此列舉所決定。The location of the log is determined by this enumeration. 您可以將 或 類別的 屬性設為其中一個 值來指定稽核記錄的層級。The level of the audit log is specified by setting the or the property of the class to one of the values. 您也可以指定稽核行為使用[ <serviceSecurityAudit> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md)繫結。You can also specify audit behavior using the [<serviceSecurityAudit>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md) binding. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果屬性設定為 安全性和`Audit Object Access`中未設定`Local Security Policy`，稽核事件將不會寫入安全性記錄檔。If the property is set to Security and `Audit Object Access` is not set in the `Local Security Policy`, audit events will not be written to the Security log. 這時不會傳回任何失敗，但是稽核項目也不會寫入安全性記錄檔中。No failure is returned, but audit entries will not be written to the Security log. 此外，呼叫的執行緒必須具備 `SeAuditPrivilege` 才能寫入安全性記錄檔。In addition, the calling thread must have `SeAuditPrivilege` to be able to write to the Security log. ## 預設值視作業系統而定Default Dependent on Operating System 當將屬性設定為預設值，作業系統會判斷哪些記錄檔會實際寫入至。When setting the property to the Default value, the operating system determines which log will actually be written to. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 稽核](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/auditing-security-events.md)。For more information, see [Auditing](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/auditing-security-events.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將 屬性設為其中一個 值。The following example sets the property to one of the values. [!code-csharp[AuditingSecurityEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/cs/auditingsecurityevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AuditingSecurityEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/vb/auditingsecurityevents.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation Application = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定事件記錄檔中的應用程式記錄。

span.span: Specifies the Application log in the event log.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation Default = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定作業系統所決定的預設位置。

span.span: Specifies the default location, which is determined by the operating system.

summary.span: 如果支援寫入安全性記錄檔 (例如在 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] 與 [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)] (含) 以後平台)，預設的記錄檔位置為安全性記錄檔。

span.span: If writing to the Security log is supported (such as on [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)] and later platforms), the default log location is the Security log.

summary.span: 否則，(例如在 [!INCLUDE[wxpsp2](~/includes/wxpsp2-md.md)])，預設的記錄檔位置就是應用程式記錄檔。

span.span: Otherwise (such as in [!INCLUDE[wxpsp2](~/includes/wxpsp2-md.md)]), the default log location is the Application log.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation Security = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定事件記錄檔中的安全性記錄。

span.span: Specifies the Security log in the event log.

summary.span: 呼叫的執行緒必須具備 才能寫入安全性記錄檔。

span.span: The calling thread must have to be able to write to the Security log.
